snippet: Robert Lustyik, an F.B.I. agent in New York, is charged with participating in a multimillion-dollar international plot that involved an Army lieutenant colonel and a defense contractor.
abstract: Robert Lustyik, a Federal Bureau of Investigation agent in New York, is arrested and charged with participating in a multimillion-dollar international fraud scheme that involved kickback payments to a former Army lieutenant colonel in charge of Special Forces operations in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Robert Lustyik, an F.B.I. agent in New York, is charged with participating in a multimillion-dollar international plot that involved an Army lieutenant colonel and a defense contractor.

headline.seo: Lured by Promises of Wealth, F.B.I. Agent Was Drawn Into Fraud Scheme, Prosecutors Say
